geneVariantDescriptions.description: GLI1 over exp indicates an over expression of the Gli1 protein and/or mRNA. However, the mechanism causing the over expression is unspecified.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, GSK2334470 moderately inhibited growth of primary liver cancer cells over expressing target genes of the Notch (HES1, HEY1, TRIB2, NOTCH3, CCND1) and Hedgehog (GLI1, GLI2) pathways in culture (PMID: 27103434).

references.title: The inhibition of Akt-Pdpk1 interaction efficiently suppresses the growth of murine primary liver tumor cells.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, LY3039478 and NSC156529 combination treatment resulted in improved growth inhibition over single drug treatment in primary liver cancer cells over expressing target genes of the Notch (HES1, HEY1, TRIB2, NOTCH3, CCND1) and Hedgehog (GLI1, GLI2) pathways in culture (PMID: 27103434).

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Odomzo (sonidegib) inhibited survival of tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice over expressing wild-type Gli1 in culture (PMID: 26130651).
